text: There are several best practices. But to make sure your  images are shown the disired size you best just upload them the size you want them to show up in your email. Otherwise some email clients (outlook mostly) won't be able to resize. Outlook (and a few others) ignore image sizing via css. So you better make sure to have the right size of images uploaded.
hey, it is a way to fetch a custom rss feed (not blog) inside email? I'm trying with a custom module but javascript is not rendered by all email clients
hello all, wondering if there’s a way to reverse columns in the drag and drop on mobile view? what’s the best way to create this look and have the images stack above the content?
